description: Master grid calibration presets for CV Validator. Verified presets are hand-checked against ground truth. Unknown resolutions use weighted interpolation between verified anchors.

_calibration_notes.non_linear_scaling: The game does NOT scale linearly - 1440p has SMALLER icons than 1080p (39 vs 44). Spacing patterns differ completely.
_calibration_notes.verified_anchor_strategy: Use hand-verified 'master' presets as anchors. Interpolate between them for unknown resolutions.

source_types.verified: Hand-verified against ground truth screenshots - highest confidence
source_types.calculated: Calculated via interpolation or formula - may need adjustment

1280x720.name: 720p
1280x720.notes: Baseline resolution - needs verification with 720p screenshots

1920x1080.name: 1080p
1920x1080.notes: Verified via level_803 ground truth - 72 total slots (24x3)

2560x1440.name: 1440p
2560x1440.notes: Verified via level_108 ground truth - SMALLER icons than 1080p, different spacing pattern
